name: Stack ice cream with Parry the parrot!
name_original: Stack ice cream with Parry the parrot!
description:
Everybody likes ice cream right? Stack as much as you can before time runs out!

- Stacking ice
- Quotes from Parry the Parrot

Credits: Korbinian Maag
